sentences.en: But to do it, Europe should develop its own unified Asia policy, set its own priorities, and learn to have one voice on the euro and European defense strategy.
sentences.cn: 但是想做到的话，欧洲必须制定其统一的亚洲政策，选择它的优先事务，并学会在欧元和欧洲防御战略上保持统一的声音。

sentences.en: Euro bills will be uniform throughout the euro area.
sentences.cn: 欧元钞票将会在使用欧元的地区形成统一.

sentences.en: Euro Plaza carries the main commercial functions of the Villa district.
sentences.cn: 欧陆广场承担了为别墅区提供商业服务的角色,营造了高档的住宅环境.

sentences.en: Germany 's resurgence has set a challenge for the euro zone's southern members .
sentences.cn: 德国的复苏已经挑战了欧元区南部成员。

sentences.en: He claimed Tony Blair is trying to get us into the euro by stealth.
sentences.cn: 他声称托尼·布莱尔正试图神不知鬼不觉地让我们加入欧元体系。

sentences.en: In his view, the euro single market is an inevitable outcome.
sentences.cn: 他认为, 欧元是单一市场发展的必然结局.

sentences.en: In the euro zone, most are based on a fixed rate.
sentences.cn: 而在欧元区, 大多数按揭贷款的利率是固定的.

sentences.en: Millions of words have been written about the introduction of the euro.
sentences.cn: 有关采用欧元的文章已经有很多。

sentences.en: One Euro is currently worth about 1 dollar 40 cents.

sentences.cn: 欧洲迪斯尼的股票价格迅速上涨了17便士。

sentences.en: The advent of the Euro will redefine Europe.
sentences.cn: 欧元的出现将重新定义欧洲.

sentences.en: The euro exchanges two year low point which dollar close eve creates.
sentences.cn: 欧元兑美元接近前夜创出的两年低点.

sentences.en: The euro fell on the foreign exchanges yesterday.
The euro has moved from the realms of theory into reality.
sentences.cn: 欧元已由理论变成了现实.

sentences.en: The three members are Euro union, Thailand and Djibouti.
sentences.cn: 这三个成员分别是欧盟 、 泰国和吉布提.

sentences.en: They live in fantasy worlds which make Euro Disney seem uninventive.
sentences.cn: 他们生活在幻想的世界里，相形之下连欧洲迪士尼乐园都显得毫无创意。

words.tran_cn: 欧元（欧盟的统一货币单位）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 欧洲迪斯尼（位于法国巴黎郊外的大型主题公园）

trans.tran_cn: 欧元（欧洲经济共同体的统一货币单位）
trans.tran_en: The euro is a unit of currency that is used by several member countries of the European Union
